named-query.name: READ_OUT_OF_BOX_SECTION_DEFINITIONS
named-query.query: SELECT sectionDefinition FROM com.mpower.entity.customization.SectionDefinition sectionDefinition WHERE sectionDefinition.pageType = :pageType AND sectionDefinition.site.id is null

named-query.name: READ_CUSTOMIZED_SECTION_DEFINITIONS
named-query.query: SELECT sectionDefinition FROM com.mpower.entity.customization.SectionDefinition sectionDefinition WHERE sectionDefinition.pageType = :pageType AND sectionDefinition.site.id = :siteId

named-query.name: READ_OUT_OF_BOX_SECTION_FIELDS
named-query.query: SELECT sectionField FROM com.mpower.entity.customization.SectionField sectionField WHERE sectionField.sectionName = :sectionName AND sectionField.site.id is null

named-query.name: READ_CUSTOMIZED_SECTION_FIELDS
named-query.query: SELECT sectionField FROM com.mpower.entity.customization.SectionField sectionField WHERE sectionField.sectionName = :sectionName AND sectionField.site.id is :siteId
